channel.title: Project RuneCity - Recruiting Developers!
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]Hello and Welcome Moparscape ! Im Recruiting Developers ATM for my new Project "RuneCity". I need Web-Designers , Client-Developers and Server Developers. More Informations below.[/size]
[size=8pt][font=comic sans ms]The Project will be a 317 - Loader 614 PI. I didnt choose a Source . We could get a clean Project Insanity and add many Content , I WANT MANY CONTENT ADDED OFCOURSE ! If there is a Decent Source that we'd like (All of our Developers) Ill take a look at it and maybe we choose it. I want that our RSPS gets really Popular.[/font][/size]
[size=24pt]Why i want to make a R.S.P.S ?[/size]
[size=8pt]When i was 11 Years old , i Play'd my first RSPS. It was GodzHell , and that Inspired me to make my own. It was a dream of me to make my Own RSPS , i loved RSPS's and hated Runescape , cause of thoose lack of Updates. I loved runescape when it was 2008. That was a really Epic Time. The PK'ing was Awesome , until it got loveed up. I want to make People Happy with many Features on the RSPS , it should have something , what Runescape doesnt have , and ofcourse what other RSPS's dont have.[/size]
If you guys want to join my Development-Team , please fill out the Application-Format below , or just Hit me with a PM.[/center]
[code]Current Age:
Experience with R.S.P.S.'s :
How many years have you been working with the Java Language:
Past R.S.P.S. Projects/Public Servers:
How many R.S.P.S. have you personally founded:
Public Releases and Information:
Do you have experience in Website Design and Development:
Please list any and all Languages which you are knowledgeable of:
Personal Recommendations (people who will vouch for claims):
How many Hours per Day can you be active and ready to work:
How many Hours per Week will you be on:
Will i be able to contact you through Skype?
Can you be trusted if given access to a Dedicated, or trusted with vital information:[/code]
I will hit you with a PM , or PM you on Skype if you're Choosen. Thank you very much Moparscape. I LOVE YOU ALL !
SKYPE : Lirimoo

item.title: Project RuneCity - Recruiting Developers!
item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo

@Lirimoo wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Hello and Welcome Moparscape ! Im Recruiting Developers ATM for my new Project “RuneCity”. I need Web-Designers , Client-Developers and Server Developers. More Informations below.[/size]

[size=8pt][font=comic sans ms]The Project will be a 317 - Loader 614 PI. I didnt choose a Source . We could get a clean Project Insanity and add many Content , I WANT MANY CONTENT ADDED OFCOURSE ! [size=24pt]Why i want to make a R.S.P.S ?[/size]

[size=8pt]When i was 11 Years old , i Play’d my first RSPS. It was GodzHell , and that Inspired me to make my own. It was a dream of me to make my Own RSPS , i loved RSPS’s and hated Runescape , cause of thoose lack of Updates. I loved runescape when it was 2008. That was a really Epic Time. The PK’ing was Awesome , until it got loveed up. I want to make People Happy with many Features on the RSPS , it should have something , what Runescape doesnt have , and ofcourse what other RSPS’s dont have.[/size]
